name: AutoSitu
long_description:
At AutoSitu (formerly MirageDoodle), we’re building coordinated AI agents that live inside cities’ cross-department development review workflows—doing the heavy lifting, escalating judgment calls, and letting staff focus where human expertise actually matters.

AutoSitu provides expert-level guidance in minutes based on precedents, helping cities and design firms navigate an increasingly complex, fragmented regulatory environment

We serve as strategic partners to forward-thinking cities and design firms across the country.
one_liner: AI-native workspace for municipal development review
